price: 49 Informe Mes serviteurs que Je suis le Très Clément, le Très Miséricordieux,
arabic: ۞ نَبِّئۡ عِبَادِيٓ أَنِّيٓ أَنَا ٱلۡغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: nabbi ʿibādī annī anā al-ghafūru al-raḥīmu
